MetaData.Value: Enter coverage area per case (in square feet). Enter 0 if the item is not sold in a case.

June 21, 2010 - This attribute is apparently used to calculate pricing. Therefore we do not want it to be a category specific attribute for the vendor to fill in. It will be an internal category specific attribute.
